batch_number_logic:
doc = variables["doc"]

# Get production item from Work Order
production_item = doc.production_item
item_doc = frappe.get_doc("Item", production_item)

material_type = item_doc.custom_material_type
item_code_field = item_doc.custom_code

# Date parts
wo_date = frappe.utils.today()
year_code = wo_date[2:4]  # Last two digits of year
month_letters = "ABCDEFGHIJKL"
month_code = month_letters[int(wo_date[5:7]) - 1]

# Prefix logic
if material_type.upper() == "FG":
    static_prefix = "RT"
elif material_type.upper() == "SFG":
    static_prefix = "IRT"
else:
    frappe.throw(f"Unsupported Material Type: {material_type}")

final_prefix = f"{static_prefix}{year_code}{month_code}{item_code_field.upper()}"

# Find last document for incremental number
last_doc = frappe.get_all(
    "Batch",
    filters=[["Batch", "name", "like", f"{final_prefix}%"]],
    order_by="creation desc",
    limit=1
)

if last_doc:
    last_name = last_doc[0].name
    last_number = int(last_name.replace(final_prefix, ""))
else:
    last_number = 0

new_number = last_number + 1
return final_prefix + str(new_number).zfill(3)
name: MerAi Batch Number
